title: Jeff Keane
text:
Jeff Keane is an American cartoonist. He is the youngest son of the late cartoonist <a href="Bil%20Keane">Bil Keane</a>, who following his father's death in 2011 became <a href="inker">inker</a> and <a href="colorist">colorist</a> of the <a href="print%20syndication">syndicated</a> <a href="comic%20strip">comic strip</a> "<a href="The%20Family%20Circus">The Family Circus</a>", after having assisted on it since 1981.
The character Jeffy from "The Family Circus" was based on the young Jeff Keane, who grew to become a theater major in college, but eventually joined the family business. He lives in <a href="Laguna%20Hills%2C%20California">Laguna Hills, California</a>, in the <a href="Nellie%20Gail%20Ranch">Nellie Gail Ranch</a> community.
Keane was elected president of The <a href="National%20Cartoonists%20Society">National Cartoonists Society</a> (NCS) for the 2007–2009 term. He was re-elected president for the 2009–2011 term.
At the 2015 <a href="Reuben%20Award">Reuben Award</a>s, Keane received the Silver T-Square Award for "outstanding service" to the cartooning profession.
